name: obj_char
description:
obj_char is a Shower Thoughts Development's 2D Puzzle Platformer for Windows. The game features a stand-in sprite who suddenly becomes self-aware and realizes that the game is being updated and that he will be deleted before the release of the next build. In an effort to save himself, the sentient sprite must destroy the build in order to hinder the developers progress and force them to not replace him.
